author: The Lunduke Journal
description:
Representatives of Ubuntu & GNOME recently defaced a wiki page for the XLibre fork of Xorg. One of them was convicted of "thousands of [sexual] assaults" of little kids. The other spreads blood libel about Jews.

More from The Lunduke Journal:
https://lunduke.com/
title: XLibre GitHub Wiki Page Defaced by a Convicted Rapist & an Anti-Semite
